Package org.logicmill.util.concurrent

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ConcurrentHashMap.Buildable
    An object returned by withLoadFactor().
    ConcurrentHashMap.LoadFactorSpec
    An object returned by an invocation of withInitCapacity() or withInitSegCount().
    ConcurrentHashMap.MapConfigBuilder
    An object that creates a MapConfig.
    ConcurrentHashMap.SegCountSpec
    An object returned by an invocation of withSegmentSize() or withExpectedMapSize().
    KeySource<T>
    An interface for classes that provide sets of keys for testing hash algorithms.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BucketStructureAssay  
    ByteArrayKey  
    ConcurrentHashMap<K,V>
    A concurrent hash map that incorporates Extendible Hashing and Hopscotch Hashing.
    ConcurrentHashMap.MapConfig
    A utility that simplifies configuration of a ConcurrentHashMap, and guarantees that the resulting configuration conforms to the necessary constraints.
    ConcurrentHashMap.MapConfigBuilderImpl  
    ConcurrentHashMapAuditor
    An object that verifies the integrity of an instance of ConcurrentHashMap.
    ConcurrentHashMapInspector
    A utility associated with ConcurrentHashMap that collects and reports performance-related statistics about a map's internal structure, focusing particularly on bucket structure.
    ConcurrentHashMapProbe
    A reflection-based test probe for accessing the internal data structures of an instance of ConcurrentHashMap.
    ConcurrentHashMapTest  
    KeySet<T>
    A container for managing a set of memory-resident byte-array keys.
    MapBucketAssay  
    RandomKeySet
    A source of pre-generated keys filled with pseudo-random numbers.
    RandomKeyStream
    A source of keys filled with pseudo-random values.
    SegmentBucketAssay  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    BucketOrderException
    Thrown by ConcurrentHashMapAuditor.verifyMapIntegrity(boolean, int) to indicate that entries in a hash map bucket are not in order.
    ConcurrentHashMapProbe.ProbeInternalException
    A wrapper for exceptions thrown within the probe implementation.
    EntryCountException
    Thrown by ConcurrentHashMapAuditor.verifyMapIntegrity(boolean, int) to indicate internal disagreement regarding the number of entries in a segment.
    EntryNotReachableException
    Thrown by ConcurrentHashMapAuditor.verifyMapIntegrity(boolean, int) to indicate that a non-null entry in the specified segment's entries array is not in the linked list of the bucket identified by the entry's hash code.
    IllegalBucketValueException
    Thrown by ConcurrentHashMapAuditor.verifyMapIntegrity(boolean, int) to indicate that an illegal value was encountered in the ConcurrentHashMap.Segment.buckets array.
    IllegalOffsetValueException
    Thrown by ConcurrentHashMapAuditor.verifyMapIntegrity(boolean, int) to indicate that an illegal value was observed in the ConcurrentHashMap.Segment.offsets array.
    NullEntryInBucketException
    Thrown by ConcurrentHashMapAuditor.verifyMapIntegrity(boolean, int) indicate that a bucket contained a null entry reference.
    SegmentIntegrityException
    An abstract base class for exceptions thrown by ConcurrentHashMapAuditor.verifyMapIntegrity(boolean, int), to indicate detection of a structural anomaly.
    WrongBucketException
    Thrown by ConcurrentHashMapAuditor.verifyMapIntegrity(boolean, int) to indicate the detection of an entry whose hash code does not match the bucket in which it was found.
    WrongSegmentException
    Thrown by ConcurrentHashMapAuditor.verifyMapIntegrity(boolean, int) to indicate the detection of an entry whose hash code does not match the shared bit pattern for the segment in which it was found.
